data.title: Decent pizza
data.text: Usually good pizza. Discounted slices with a beer if you are in alone. Down the block from Great Basin, and other joints.

data.title: Great pizza and friendly staff.
data.text:
The pizza is always good, but I'm reviewing to share about the excellent service I received. I went with my toddler son and the solo bartnder/waiter was super friendly & helpful to us and everyone who came in. 
When I was ready to leave, I asked if he was the owner or manager....nope, he was just an on-the-spot employee. I honestly reived better service here than at the vast majority of high-end restaurants I've visited. Thanks, Blind Onion!

data.title: Great pizza and sides
data.text: Placed a large order for my sons 20th birthday to go.  Order was perfect and they added extra sauces and dressings without asking.  General pizza was delicious and wings were great. Would definitely go back.

data.title: Homemade Pizza at it's Best
data.text: Went to visit our kids over the Balloon Race weekend and they took us to the Blind Onion at Victorian Ave. My son told us that everything is homemade and that it may take a little while, but the pizza would be well worth the wait and boy was he right! We were greeted immediately upon entering by a very friendly gal, we chose a table to sit at and were offered drinks right away. After looking over the varied menu with lots of choices our party chose different items. My husband and I ordered the Popeye Pizza with spinach and chicken, absolutely delicious, our son and daughter in law got the special, which they were absolutely enjoying and our daughter and her boyfriend chose from the make your own menu ( which is great for my daughter because she can be picky). We all ordered some breadsticks and they were without a doubt the best I have ever had. This is not a fast food joint ( far from it), but you will really be missing out if you don't try this place. I was really impressed by the quality of the food and service and even if you have a picky eater in the group there is something for everyone on their menu. I am so glad our son took us there, we thoroughly enjoyed the pizza and will absolutely return on our next trip to visit our kids.

data.title: Great pizza
data.text: Fun place to sit for a while and enjoy some great beer and pizza. Great service. Very friendly staff.

data.title: Great Pizza and crust
data.text: I have eaten the General (combo) and Breath Buster (garlic) pizzas.  The ingredients are well distribute.  The thin crust is great and you have honey on the table to dip your pizza edge in as a dessert.

data.title: Awesome Pizza
data.text: Always good pizza when we go. Just had pepperoni tonight, but still good. Always change up the on tap beer. Had a watermelon beer tonight  was oh so good.

data.title: One of the best pizzas I've ate!!
data.text: I did a create your own pizza. I had Alfredo with pesto sauce, chicken, spinach, Italian sausage, mozzarella, and drizzled the crust with honey!!! I will definitely be going back for another pizza and to try their wings. The service was a little slow but the pizza was so good I can over look the wait time.

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: Best pizza in Sparks!  Their menu has a wide variety of pizza options, so you're sure to find something amazing.  The staff is friendly. Plenty of TVs to watch sports.  There's also some games around for the kids.

data.title: Lunch Pizza
data.text: Crust was great and crusty. Honey on the crust was like dessert.  Not very crowded; hope it was not normal.

data.title: One of my two favorite pizza places in the USA.
data.text: The Blind Onion makes my favorite west coast style pizza.  Nice thick slices of meat and vegetables with a tasty braided crust.  My favorite is a combo called "the generals."  Several micro brews on tap and they actually had Schlitz in a bottle.  Good thing it's right in Sparks because when I want my OTHER favorite pizza I have to fly to Denver to visit the Edgewater Inn.  (If you go there, try the Howdy Special, which is NOT west coast style but very good.)   So, how about that,,, two reviews in one.

data.title: Try the honey on the crust
data.text: The pizza is delicious. Nice thin pizza then a very yeasty braided crust. Its really tasty. I liked the honey on the crust. My husband didnt care for it though. The place was interesting. They do have tap beer which is always a plus. 🍺 we had garlic put on out pizza. So yummy. If we ever go back ill tell them not to spare the garlic.😊

data.title: Great pizza with fresh veggies and meat toppings
data.text: Blind onion is close to home and is a quick and convenient take out!  We prefer to take it home because it s a little noisy.

data.title: Pizza & beer heaven
data.text: My family & I went to the Blind Onion & boy oh boy, the best pizza yet. The pizza was very good. The crust on the pizza was thick & delicious. Plenty of beers to chose from. I would definitely visit The Blind Onion again when in Sparks,NV.

data.title: What a nice find!
data.text: After a long day having fun with my family, we decided to take the easy way out and have pizza. My son goes to UNR and had heard about this place so we thought we'd give it a try. First, it's located in a neat little place where there are a number of other pubs, saloons and bars. Right next door there was also a little Italian family restaurant. But we wanted pizza and beer. It was a little spendy but we were very happy with a pepperoni and pepperoni half olive, half mushroom. She also let us sample a few beers to help us determine which pitcher to order. We were able to sit outside on a beautiful night and enjoy our beer and pizza and it was very enjoyable!  We will be back. Oh, and the crust with honey is absolutely BOMB! ! ! MMMMM! ! !

data.title: Home Sweet Home
data.text: I've been gone for 1 1/2 years and couldn't wait to come here and have the Best pizza!! The crust is the perfect thickness, you have a wide variety of pizzas to choose from, and the cocktails are excellent!! Wide selection of beer! The honey on the table is for your crust!! Must visit if you are on Victorian St. in Sparks, NV!!

data.title: Very good pizza, served with honey!
data.text: The pizza was real good but the best part was eating the crust with honey! Had never done that before and it was excellent. The staff is friendly and has the atmosphere of a

data.title: Wonderful, fresh pizza
data.text: First of all, I love that you can design from an array of fresh ingredients.  The crust is outstanding and has a braided edge that is perfect with the honey that is on every table.  I usually take it home and the wait is minimal, the quality excellent.  There is a table shuffle board for kiddos, big screens for sports, and some crafted beers on the menu.  The items on the menu are limited, but what is there is very tasty.

data.title: Great local pub
data.text: So delicious. Friendly wait staff, great Caesar salad and pizza. Chill atmosphere. Way better than anything offered at The Nugget.

data.title: Good pizza what else can I say?
data.text: the white sauce is great if that's your thing! Otherwise, their pesto pizza was a little sparse on the pesto sauce, but overall this is a great pizza place.
